name: Quantstruct
headline: Auto-improve & publish technical docs with AI
description:
Quantstruct automatically creates and improves product documentation, implementation guides, and changelogs for API & SDK products, web-based enterprise software, and internal applications.

Quantstruct identifies gaps in your knowledge base based on each product release or unfulfilled customer query. It uses multiple AI agents to search existing knowledge sources, test existing docs for validity and style guidelines, and clicks, scrolls, and uses enterprise software through a web browser to generate docs with embedded screenshots and video recordings. Quanstruct is available as a cloud service to start, targeting technical writers, content writing, professional services, and product teams.

Traditional generative AI tools risk hallucinating critical API & SDK fields, even with RAG based approaches. Purely agent-based approaches risk providing unpredictable output that can diverge from desired documentation processes. Finally, no company‚Äôs review and publishing workflow is the same. Quantstruct is the easiest way to onboard and customize AI agents to continuously improve your documentation based on your customer needs and product evolution. https://quantstruct.com
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:developer-tools; industry:b2b; industry:api; industry:automation; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Newman Hu, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of Quantstruct. We're building AI agents to create the best documentation for your product. Newman previously built search infrastructure at Moveworks and Replit (YC W18), where he managed mission critical platforms powering Gen AI experiences for Fortune 500 companies. EECS @ Berkeley

founders.name: Sarthak Srinivas, Founder
founders.description: Cofounder of Quantstruct (YC W25). Built an agent developer platform from 0 to $2+ million as product lead while onboarding multiple Fortune 100 companies at Moveworks. Published and reviewed 1000s of documentation guide updates to support customers and internal teams, before realizing agent-based workflows could do his job. Ex-Kleiner Perkins fellow. Published research with Google Glass inventor (who coined ‚Äúwearable computing‚Äù) at Georgia Tech.

+ # Create User
+ 
+ Creates a new user in the database with the provided name and email.
+ 
+ ### Request
+ POST `/api/users`
+ 
+ ### Example
+ ```python
+ import requests
+ 
+ response = requests.post(
+   "/api/users",
+   json={
+     "name": "John Doe",
+     "email": "john@example.com"
+   }
+ )
+ 
+ user = response.json()
+ ```

### Take Action

## Schedule a Call
## Frequently Asked Questions
### What is Quantstruct?
Quantstruct is an agentic workflow platform for technical documentation. It helps teams maintain accurate, up-to-date technical docs. It automatically detects changes in your codebase and suggests relevant docs updates.
### How does Quantstruct work?
Quantstruct integrates with your GitHub repositories and Slack workspace. When code changes are detected, our AI analyzes the changes and automatically generates documentation updates. These updates are then sent for review through GitHub pull requests or Slack notifications.
### Is Quantstruct suitable for my team?
Quantstruct is ideal for software development teams of any size who want to maintain high-quality documentation without the manual overhead. It's especially valuable for teams working on APIs, SDKs, or any software product with a developer community.
### How accurate are Quantstruct's updates?
Quantstruct's AI uses prompts and finetuned models that comprise high quality technical documentation and code samples. All generated content goes through multiple validation steps and is presented for human review before being published. Our system also learns from your team's feedback to improve accuracy over time.
### What integrations does Quantstruct support?
Quantstruct currently integrates with Git-based documentation management platforms (Mintlify, Fern, GitBook, Docusaurus, Nextra, etc.), Slack, and popular documentation platforms. We are developing integrations for Discord and Linear, and adding new integrations based on user feedback.
### How do I get started?
Getting started is easy! Sign up above, connect your GitHub repository and Slack workspace, and our team will guide you through the setup process. We offer personalized onboarding to ensure you get the most value from Quantstruct.
¬© Quantstruct, Inc. 2025

generated_description:
### Quantstruct Overview

Founded in 2024 and hailing from the prestigious Y Combinator Batch W25, Quantstruct is a burgeoning company based in San Francisco, composed of a nimble team of two. The startup is on a mission to revolutionize technical documentation by leveraging the power of AI. Their main goal? To **automate the improvement and publication of technical documents** in real time.

### What They Do

Originally envisioned as a solution for generating and enhancing product documentation, Quantstruct automatically creates implementation guides and changelogs tailored for API & SDK products, web-based enterprise software, and internal applications. Rather than having users manually sift through documentation, Quantstruct identifies gaps based on product releases and unsatisfied customer queries. It employs multiple AI agents that evaluate the validity and style of existing documentation, accessing internal knowledge sources, and even interacting with enterprise software to create documentation that‚Äôs as insightful as it is comprehensive. 

### Key Features

- **AI-Powered Documentation:** By analyzing code changes in GitHub and scanning existing documents, Quantstruct suggests improvements and generates new documentation automatically. It does this while ensuring that everything maintains a high standard of accuracy through rigorous validation protocols.
  
- **User-Friendly Integrations:** The platform integrates seamlessly with popular tools like Slack and GitHub, allowing for a dynamic workflow that keeps documentation up-to-date without the manual overhead associated with traditional documentation practices.

- **Customization:** Recognizing that no two companies share the same documentation needs, Quantstruct offers simple onboarding and customization for teams. This allows organizations to tailor the system to align with their unique review and publishing workflows.

### Challenges They Address

Traditional generative AI tools often struggle with accuracy, particularly in generating vital API and SDK fields, while agent-based approaches can produce unpredictable results. Quantstruct overcomes these challenges with a blend of structure and flexibility, ensuring documents evolve alongside product updates and customer feedback, thereby driving continuous improvement.

### Current Status and Vision

With its innovative approach to technical writing, Quantstruct is positioned to be an essential tool for technical writers, content creators, professional services, and product teams. Their website (https://quantstruct.com) serves as a portal for potential users to learn more, sign up, and even schedule a chat with the founders to dive deeper into what Quantstruct can offer.

In summary, Quantstruct is more than just a documentation tool; it‚Äôs a forward-thinking platform designed to bring automation, customization, and precision to technical writing, ultimately supporting teams in delivering stellar user experiences without the hassle.
